titles.title: Directing the Fine Arts Board to obtain a bust of the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky, for display in the House of Representatives wing of the United States Capitol.
Directing the Fine Arts Board to obtain a bust of the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky, for display in the House of Representatives wing of the United States Capitol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: This resolution directs the Fine Arts Board to obtain a bust of Volodymyr Zelensky, the President of Ukraine, for permanent display in the U.S. Capitol.
